ref: 62 *agnirujā ʻ a disease with burning sensation ʼ. [agní -- 1, rujā -- ]
H. āgrū m. ʻ eruption on the lips from heat ʼ;
G. āgru m. ʻ disease causing burning sensation in the mouth ʼ;
M. āgrū̃, ag˚, ā̆gerū̃ n. ʻ heat eruptions on lips and tongue ʼ; for gender poss. cf. *rujas -- n. in rujaskara -- . -- Doubtful, but less likely < agnírūpa -- .
